actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."monsters" SET
		"is_npc" = {{is_an_npc.isChecked}},

		"npc_has_been_seen" = {{npc_has_been_seen.isChecked}},

		-- ddb_description
		"ddb_description" = {{desc_on_ddb_helper.generate_set_ddb_description()}},

		-- has_description_on_ddb
		"has_description_on_ddb" = {{desc_on_ddb_helper.generate_set_has_description_on_ddb()}}
  WHERE monster_id = {{get_one_random_monster.data[0].monster_id}}; -- Specify a valid condition here. Removing the condition may update every row in the table!
